name: | A Ramdom Pong .|
description:
A very ramdom Pong!

-Controls-

[F11] Fullscreen (on/off)

[ESC] Close Game

Menu

[Arrow Up] move up

[Arrow Down] move down

[ENTER] select option

Player 1

[W] move up

[S] move down

[SPACE] action

Player2

[Arrow Up] move up

[Arrow Down] move down

[ENTER] action
